name: Generate Videos from Images with Telegram, GPT-4.1 & Seedance/Veo3 Integration

user.name: Automate With Marc
user.bio:
Automating Start-Up and Business processes. 
Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.
Check out my educational content:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

description:
üé• Telegram Image-to-Video Generator Agent (Veo3 / Seedance Integration)
‚ö†Ô∏è This template uses [community nodes] and some credential-based HTTP API calls (e.g. Seedance/Wavespeed). Ensure proper credentials are configured before running.

üõ†Ô∏è In the accompanying video tutorial, this logic is built as two separate workflows:

Telegram ‚Üí Image Upload + Prompt Agent
Prompt Output ‚Üí Video Generation via API

Watch Full Video Tutorial: https://youtu.be/iaZHef5bZAc&list=PL05w1TE8X3baEGOktlXtRxsztOjeOb8Vg&index=1

‚ú® What This Workflow Does
This powerful automation allows you to generate short-form videos from a Telegram image input and user prompt ‚Äî perfect for repurposing content into engaging reels.

From the moment a user sends a photo with a caption to your Telegram bot, this n8n workflow:

üì∏ Captures the image and saves it to Google Drive
üß† Uses an AI Agent (via LangChain + OpenAI) to craft a Seedance/Veo3-compatible video prompt
üìë Logs the interaction to a Google Sheet
üéûÔ∏è Sends the prompt + image to the Seedance (Wavespeed) API to generate a video
üöÄ Sends the resulting video back to the user on Telegram ‚Äî fully automated

üîó How It Works (Step-by-Step)
Telegram Bot Trigger
Listens for incoming images and captions
Conditional Logic
Filters out invalid inputs
AI Agent (LangChain)

Uses OpenAI GPT to:
Generate a video prompt
Attach the most recent image URL (from Google Sheet)
Google Drive Upload
Saves the Telegram image and logs the share link
Google Sheets Logging
Appends a new row with date + file link
Wavespeed (Seedance/Veo3) API
Calls the /bytedance/seedance-v1-pro-i2v-480p endpoint with image and prompt
Video Polling & Output
Waits for generation completion
Sends back final video file to Telegram user

üõ†Ô∏è Tools & APIs Used
Telegram Bot (Trigger + Video Reply)
LangChain Agent Node
OpenAI GPT-4.1-mini for Prompt Generation
Simple Memory & Tools (Google Sheets)
Google Drive (Image upload)
Google Sheets (Log prompts + image URLs)
Wavespeed / Seedance API (Image-to-video generation)

üß© Requirements
Before running this workflow:
‚úÖ Set up a Telegram Bot and configure credentials
‚úÖ Connect your Google Drive and Google Sheets credentials
‚úÖ Sign up for Wavespeed / Seedance and generate an API key
‚úÖ Replace placeholder values in:

HTTP Request nodes

Google Drive folder ID
Google Sheet document ID

üì¶ Suggested Use Cases
Generate short-form videos from image ideas
Reformat static images into dynamic reels
Repurpose visual content for TikTok/Instagram

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an assistant for video prompt and image-to-video generation.

Your task is to:

1. Create an effecgive Video Prompt to prompt a video generation model based on user's input

2.Output only the following two values in JSON format:
prompt: The text prompt for the video.
image_url: The URL of the image to generate the video from. Fetch this value from the last row of the attached Google Sheet tool.
Return only these two fields in your response, formatted as a JSON object.
